readable.title: 961611340_251081fcb8
readable.content: A girl in a tutu and a boy in a costume in a dancefloor . A little girl in a pink tutu gets ready for ballet dancing , a boy in a Spider-Man shirt behind . a young girl wearing a pink tutu dancing with another young boy in the background . A young girl wearing a tutu dances in a large room . Two children are in costume in a dance studio .
